issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement MASK_FIRST_N and MASK_LAST_N functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
**MASK_FIRST_N**

<font color="#172b4d">Returns a masked version of str with the first n values masked.</font><font color="#172b4d"> Upper case letters are converted to "X", lower case letters are converted to "x" and numbers are converted to "n". For example, mask_first_n("1234-5678-8765-4321", 4) results in nnnn-5678-8765-4321.

**MASK_LAST_N**

Returns a masked version of str with the last n values masked. Upper case letters are converted to "X", lower case letters are converted to "x" and numbers are converted to "n". For example, mask_last_n("1234-5678-8765-4321", 4) results in 1234-5678-8765-nnnn.</font>
